comment: Good! If you don't eat well, you won't create a good immune response and you won't get the benefit of the vaccine. Eat well, add to the immunity barrier
amr:
# ::snt Good! If you don't eat well, you won't create a good immune response and you won't get the benefit of the vaccine. Eat well, add to the immunity barrier
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (g / good-02
            :mode expressive)
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (c / create-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (r / respond-01
                        :ARG2 (ii / immune-02)
                        :ARG1-of (g2 / good-02)))
            :op2 (b / benefit-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (v / vaccine)
                  :ARG1 y)
            :condition (e / eat-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 y
                  :manner (w / well)))
      :snt3 a
      :op1 (e2 / eat-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 y
            :manner (w2 / well))
      :op2 (a2 / add-02
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG2 (b2 / barrier
                  :mod (ii2 / immunity))))
